title: Economic Survey 2022 live updates: Govt projects 8-8.5% growth rate for financial year 2023 - Times of India
content: Economic Survey 2022 live updates: Govt projects 8-8.5% growth rate for financial year 2023  Times of India
description: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman tabled the Economic Survey for 2021-22 in the Lok Sabha on Monday soon after the President's Address to both Houses of Parliament. She will present the Union Budget for the next financial year beginning April 1, 2022, on Tuesday. Stay with TOI for all latest updates
